newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA EARLY AFTERNOON RADIO REPORTS - APRIL 25.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA EARLY AFTERNOON RADIO REPORTS - APRIL 25.

text.p: Here are the main news reports broadcast by Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station at mid-day on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- The interrogation of war crimes suspect Aleksandras Lileikis was stopped for the seventh time today because of his poor health. It is expected that the next interrogation will be continued on Tuesday. Lileikis was been questioned as a witness so fa.

- The trial of the leader of the pro-Soviet Jedinstvo organisation, Valerij Ivanov, charged with slandering the victims of the January 13, 1991, coup attempt, was postponed because the witnesses failed to attend the court hearings.
- The talks on the demarcation of the Lithuania-Belarus border continued in Vilnius today.
